Description:
Central Historic Living.
A generous corner block allotment in a central Bendigo location makes this three-bedroom two-bathroom home an enticing investment.
A large neat landscaped front yard leads to the sturdy brick home, stepping inside through the front formal entry you're greeted by the updated kitchen and dining area. Its spacious layout offers modern appliances, plenty of overhead cabinetry and natural light.
Peer down the hallway and along the polished timber flooring and you'll discover a large airy laundry with an abundance of storage and outside access, the light and bright main bathroom offering a large spa bath and all the essentials and two of the bedrooms with built-in robes.
Unique to this home is the spiral staircase accessed through the main living room with leads to the master suite. This space offers comfort and practicality with its own balcony, walk-in robe and three-piece ensuite.
The highlights continue in the secure backyard with its side yard vehicle access and carport, water tank and an additional separate room perfect for a teenagers retreat or guest bedroom. The room offers its own split system and ceiling fan.
A walk to nearby North Bendigo Recreation Reserve and close to Bendigo Corner Store Café, Catherin McAuley College, schools, daycares and Bendigo CBD the location is a standout.
Contact agent Jesse Forbes to arrange your inspection today.
Insights: 9 Ironbark Road, Bendigo VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 81 other 3 bedroom house in Bendigo have recently been sold.

Description:
Elsworth Park - Strathfieldsaye
Located in the heart of Strathfieldsaye, this peaceful estate is just a 5 minute drive from Bendigo and an even shorter drive to the Strathfieldsaye shopping complex which is equipped with a supermarket, hairdressers, doctors, pharmacist, post office and even a local Tavern! Extremely family friendly with two school options, plenty of sporting clubs and easy access to transport. With great prices ranging from $140,000 and up, all services are available, all titles have been issued and a copy of the covenants is available upon request, it offers a great mix for first home owners, families and retirees!!
Set on the corner of Camden Way and Pitt Pl, this 555m2 allotment offers plenty of scope for side access and/or a range of building styles depending on whether you want to take advantage of the 32m frontage to Camden Way or the 13m frontage to Pitt Place.

Description:
LIVE THE LUXE LIFESTYLE WITH 31 SQUARES, A BEAUTIFUL POOL AND LEVEL 1032m2 GARDEN
Here is a rare opportunity to buy a one-off custom built home in Strathfieldsaye's finest prestige pocket. Step inside and you will be greeted by stunning open plan kitchen, meals and living and an overall sense of design sophistication. The home offers an open plan kitchen and dining/living area which spills out onto the alfresco deck with stunning private pool area with an impressive custom-built timber door and hut. The sleek white kitchen features a huge walk in pantry, 900mm gas cooking, dishwasher and stone benches. The master bedroom is situated at the rear of the home and includes a WIR and luxurious ensuite, with walk in shower. There are three further double bedrooms all with walk in robes, a family bathroom and central laundry. There is access down the side of the house perfect for a caravan or boat, and a large rear enclosed yard. The home also offers ducted heating and cooling. This home has been thoughtfully designed and finished to a high standard. Be sure to inspect today!
Internal area
295m²

Description:
Be amazed at Aspect!
Located in the ever-growing Family neighbourhood of Huntly, sits this five year old, neat as a pin, three bedroom, two bathroom, Metricon built home.
8 minutes to the train station and shopping center and most amenities.
This low maintenance, well sized property, allocated on an ideal 388 square metre block (approximately) is perfect for first home buyers, downsizers or investors.
Completed with generously sized bedrooms, open plan living space and plenty of quality fixtures and fittings, this home is sure to impress.
Currently leased to good tenants paying $350 each week. Lease ends Oct 2020 but they are happy to sign another year lease or negotiate a long term lease.
Don't miss out opportunity. Call Jacky 0468870611 for more details and organize an inspection.
(ENOE)

Description:
Elwood Drive - Strathdale
Elwood Drive certainly offers the opportunity to live in one of Bendigo's most exclusive locations. Positioned off prestigious Harley Street you have a delightful natural bushland backdrop, two established shopping centres in Strathdale, schools, kindergarten and day care all within minutes. It's an established and sought-after location boasting established quality homes throughout. Each lot is ripe and ready for your home.
Lot 25 is one of the premium lots at 854sqm with a frontage of 11.54 located in the middle of the court. It is elevated and set amongst quality homes either side.

Description:
Space and seclusion
Ideally located within a quiet court off Cedar Drive in popular Ascot, is this large 1,911 square metres of serenity. Having been subdivided off the front home ensures your privacy being well set back from the court and accessed by a 53 metre long driveway which is 4 metres wide. Located just a short distance to popular Epsom Village Shopping Centre and roughly only a Par 4 from well renowned Bendigo Golf Club.

Description:
Fantastic Location
Clarendon Terrace - A modern two storey, terraced townhouse on offer in convenient inner city location opposite the Bendigos Hospital Precinct. Currently lease by an excellent tenant returning $340 per week until 28/10/2020.
Comprising of two bedrooms, master double bedroom upstairs with ensuite. Second bedroom downstairs serviced by its own bathroom. Impressive timber staircase reveals bright open plan kitchen/dining/living & study nook area which flows to sunny balcony on the upper level. Laundry has great storage space downstairs.
Secure double garage with remote (with extra storage) which is accessible from a sliding security gate entrance off Uley Street which is off Arnold Street.
There are 17 townhouses in the complex. Built in 2007 this townhouse makes an ideal choice - for the investor or owner occupier. So close to Bendigos CBD.

Description:
BUSHLAND RETREAT ACREAGE NEAR ALL AMENITIES
Positioned midway between the many amenities of Strathfieldsaye and Junortoun, this country family home is just minutes from secondary and primary schools, shops, eateries, medical practitioners and more. With a bus stop just down the road, the home sits on over nine acres and provides the perfect blend of bushland tranquility with city proximity.
Set back from the road amongst established natives, the weatherboard house sits at the end of a long, circular driveway. A brick paved entry leads to the front door and indoors, quality timber flooring can be found throughout the hallway and main living space. The property offers four bedrooms. All enjoy built-in robes and one is generously proportioned with access to the outdoors, meaning it could easily also serve as a rumpus room or additional living space. The master bedroom provides a spacious walk-in robe and French doors open out to the rear yard and bushland. A huge, luxurious ensuite has been recently updated and enjoys a dual vanity, floor-to-ceiling tiling, a freestanding bathtub, walk-in shower with two showerheads and large dual aspect windows overlooking the private native garden beyond.
A spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining space is full of natural light and the new kitchen provides a timeless, modern country décor with white timber cabinetry and timber benchtops along with modern, quality appliances and ample storage.
The living space and laundry both open out onto a spacious rear deck that runs across the back of the house perfect for outdoor living. A brick paved path and terrace run across the lawn area to a second alfresco space: a freestanding shelter with power. The fantastic entertaining spaces overlooks the fully fenced inground swimming pool. Beyond the main yard is a four-car shed, garden shed, acres of private native bushland and a dam. To the side of the house is a great home office or studio absolutely ideal for a creative.
Additional features include:
Ducted refrigerative cooling and ducted heating
Newly refurbished throughout with new bathroom, ensuite and kitchen
Modern kitchen appliances including integrated dishwasher, fully plumbed fridge and 900mm stove with five-burner gas cooktop
Spacious alfresco area (8m x 3.6m)
Large shed (4 car capacity, concrete flooring)
Garden shed (3m x 3m)
Inground swimming pool (salt chlorinated, 12m x 5m)
Dam
Separate studio (5m x 3m, split system heating and cooling, carpet tiles, exterior sensor lights)
This recently refurbished home, set amongst picturesque surrounds, is ideal for a buyer looking for a move-in ready property in the heart of bushland, that is still within easy reach of all amenities. Offering privacy, peace and tranquility, yet close to everything, this bushland retreat has plenty to offer.

HUGE 2,000M2 TITLED BLOCK IN MAIDEN GULLY
Nestled in a quiet and peaceful part of Maiden Gully is this huge 2,000m2 titled block of land offering a country outlook while only ten mins (approx.) drive to the Bendigo CBD. All town services are available and ready to connect, meaning you can take advantage of the Victorian government grants and start planning and building your dream home right away. An opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
THERE'S PRETTY MUCH EVERYTHING!!
This one is simply a fantastic home on a hard-to-find 5684m2 allotment in sought-after Old Maiden Gully. The property has been well cared for and constantly improved over time and is ripe for its new owners to just move in and enjoy everything on offer!
The home boasts four spacious bedrooms, three have large built-in-robes (the fourth could be a large study); the main suite boasts a walk-behind fitted robe, spacious en suite with separate toilet room and linen cupboard.
There are fantastic living options including a large lounge with feature bay window and embossed vinyl planking; a separate rumpus room and the central living hub which includes a huge kitchen, meals and living area.
The kitchen features stone benchtops, 900mm stainless hotplates & stainless elec. wall oven, double sink and loads of cabinetry. The living hub is tiled, there's a gas log heater, skylight and sliding doors leading outside.
The family bathroom and laundry are spacious and in very good order with plenty of extra storage here; there is ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout and everything is immaculate inside.
For vehicles there is a large double auto-door garage with internal access; behind the house there is a huge 15m x 7m powered workshop with triple roller-doors, evaporative cooling and power; adjacent is a mechanics dream with an additional 10 x 7m workshop which boasts high-clearance door and ceiling and commercial quality vehicle hoist.
Outside is a huge covered alfresco space with exposed aggregate concrete and views towards the 10m x 4m in-ground salt chlorinated pool. There is extensive paving in the pool area, it is quite private & looks towards the huge rear yard.
The front yard has been carefully landscaped; planter boxes are out back and you will find plenty of space to manoeuvre a truck or larger vehicles at the rear of the two sheds. 22,500 litres of rainwater storage (with pump) and a 1.5kw of solar with a 3kw inverter.
This is hard to replicate and harder to replace - call the selling agents for more details.
Insights: 12 Yvonne Court, Maiden Gully VIC 3551 was last sold in 2020 and 45 other 4 bedroom house in Maiden Gully have recently been sold.

Description:
ROOM FOR A CARAVAN OR BOAT
With interest rates at a record low, now is the time to invest in your future...
Showcasing flawless contemporary style, this recently completed north-facing, two-storey townhouse could be the new home you've been searching for. Whether you're on the hunt for a quality investment or an on-trend abode you'll be proud to own, it won't disappoint.
The boutique complex of six residences with minimal connectivity fosters a sense of community while maintaining seclusion and privacy.
Your new home features ground-level main bedroom with walk-in-robe and ensuite, separate powder room, big combined living, dining and kitchen area opening to a private courtyard with covered alfresco for entertaining or simply relaxing in style.
Whip up gourmet delights in the customised modern kitchen boasting stylish European designed gas/electric cooking appliances, dishwasher and high-gloss cabinetry including a 4-metre stone-topped peninsula bench with a waterfall end and chic pendant lighting overhead.
Upstairs is perfect for older children or guests with an additional living room, two generous bedrooms with robes, separate bathroom and another powder room
Added features include European laundry, large under-stair storage room/study nook, split-system air-conditioning, neutral décor and two-car remote garage with internal access, storage space and personal door to the fully-fenced rear yard.
Oozing superior quality and designed to embrace easy living, this is an ideal opportunity for those looking for a home in a convenient location where you can walk to the hospital precinct, Lake Weeroona, local eateries, public transport, sporting facilities and the CBD.
Insights: 3/17 Bakewell Street, North Bendigo VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in North Bendigo have recently been sold.

Description:
Pioneer Rise Estate - Strathfieldsaye's newly released final Stage 2 (15 Lots)
- Outstanding building block of 703m2 in great location
- Stage 2 (Final) only 15 blocks available. Stage 1 sold out very quickly.
- Strathfieldsaye's newly released sub-division offers all services and has a lovely rural outlook
- Level 1 filled areas - filling if any is compacted to achieve a similar or better density than natural ground, so no significant cost to build on the level 1 filled areas
- Pioneer Rise Estate is serviced by underground electricity, natural gas, town water, NBN ready, planning permits to build are also in place for each dwelling. All you require is your building permit
- Growing suburb of Strathfieldsaye, fabulous community with all amenities
- Location is on the corner of Ryalls Lane and Guys Hill Road, Strathfieldsaye
- Demand will be significant so call Gavin to secure a block of choice.
- BAL rating is 12.5 for Lots 27, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, and 35 to 41. Lots 33 and 34 are a BAL rating 29.
- Information booklet on www.pioneerrise.com.au
This fabulous new sub-division only just now released offers families an opportunity to buy a lovely block in the fast growing suburb of Strathfieldsaye. A great family community where people enjoy living and take advantage all that Strathfieldsaye has to offer as well as being only minutes to the Bendigo CBD.
Note: The Status report online shows blocks as available. You need to call Gavin on 0427 887 766 to ask which blocks remain available.
This information has been provided to us by third parties and we do not accept any responsibility for its accuracy. You should make your own enquiries and check the information so as to determine whether or not this information is in fact accurate. You must make your own assessment and obtain professional advice if necessary.

Description:
7 acre Lifestyle Property - Strathfieldsaye
Welcome to 63 Sinclairs Road Strathfieldsaye
This glorious lifestyle property offers seven acres (3.04ha) of picturesque privacy and a sprawling family-friendly fully renovated home within easy reach of Strathfieldsaye schools, shops, and the centre of Bendigo.
Perched on one of Strathfieldsayes most elevated positions the home showcases stunning views of Mt Alexander from multiple indoor and outdoor vantage points.
Any avid cook will be drawn to the large upgraded kitchen with Miele and Bosch appliances, LED lighting and sweeping stone benchtops centrally positioned in the spacious open plan design to provide easy serviceability to the lounge, meals area, breakfast bar, family/living room, sunroom, veranda/alfresco patio or expansive covered outdoor entertaining/fernery area.
The home provides 4 bedrooms, comprising a master suite boasting a walk-in robe and an updated ensuite and a separated kids zone with three double bedrooms each offering built-in robes, ceiling fans and easy access to the updated main bathroom and laundry.
Completing the homes internal design is a must have in 2020, a gym /home office with internal and external entrance that provides separation from the main living areas of the home for anyone trying to balance a work from home and family lifestyle
Additional property features:
Recently repainted interior and exterior.
Ducted gas heating, split system air-conditioning feature gas heater and wood heater.
Quality floor coverings and blinds
11x7.5-metre three-car powered carport with a concrete floor along with additional space for a caravan, boat, or trailer.
Multiple water supply options, town water, 23000 litre water tank and large dam with pressure pump for inground watering system
Convenience of natural gas supply
Energy cost savers, R3.5 insulation batts, Draft stopper units fitted to all exhaust fans and Spinaway ceiling cavity ventilation units.
Rabbit-proof fencing surrounding the approx. 4 acre house paddock
Security of a solar electric driveway gate.
Nearby "off main road" bike tracks provide connection to Strathfieldsaye primary schools, shops, and Catherine McAuley College.
Insights: 63 Sinclairs Road, Strathfieldsaye VIC 3551 was last sold in 2012.

Description:
Investors Take Note!
This low maintenance, modern property features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a double remote garage with internal access & already has a tenant in place. Step inside to the entrance hall which includes a handy double storage cupboard. Continue along to the main bedroom which contains a walk in robe & 3 piece ensuite. The well designed, open plan living space offers dining, kitchen & lounge areas all filled with natural light. Modern appliances & a built in pantry are features of the functional kitchen. A hallway leads to the 2 remaining bedrooms both with built in robes, the family bathroom (which also contains a european laundry), separate toilet & linen cupboard. Ducted heating, a split system & ceiling fans maintain comfort control throughout the home. Sliding glass doors access the compact backyard & also a concreted courtyard/bbq area. Located in a quiet court within walking distance to shops, Primary & Secondary Schools, Botanic Gardens, Bowling Club & public transport, this fabulous property would make a great addition to your investment portfolio with an expected rental return of $330 per week.

Description:
CLASSY STRATHDALE HOME, YOUR OWN SLICE OF HOLLYWOOD WITH A 973m2 GARDEN!
Superb spaces, a low traffic location, and a neighbourhood rich with family-focused amenities it's all here at 8 Hollywood Crt, Strathdale!
Perfect to welcome your family straight away, and offering scope to further update to your tastes when budget and time allow, this warm, and inviting sanctuary is just moments from the bus, a short walk to primary and secondary schools and an easy stroll to Strathvillage and its dining options, cafes, supermarkets and of course the hotel. Buyers at every stage will see the appeal of this popular pocket.
The spacious, perfectly presented floorplan comprises a formal lounge and dining enhanced new carpet, a generous family-meals over-looked by a renovated kitchen, and large master with ensuite and walk-in robe plus three bedrooms served by the sizable family bathroom. Light, bright and updated to meet the needs of the family, it includes.
For those looking to settle into this highly sought, tightly held address in a walk-to-anywhere location, this really is a brilliant buying opportunity.

Description:
Boulevard of Dreams.
Follow your dreams to this family home in a prized Strathfieldsaye position.
The modern façade and easy-care front landscaping are just the beginning. Step inside where ducted heating and cooling flow through the three bedrooms and study (or fourth bedroom), two bathrooms, a large lounge and roomy open-plan kitchen/meals and family area all bathed in natural light courtesy of picture windows overlooking the private side garden.
The approximately 665m² low-maintenance block includes a double auto garage with roller door to the secure back yard, a covered and paved outdoor living area, garden shed, rainwater tank, gated side access for a caravan, trailer etc. and off-street parking.
It's ideally located opposite a treed reserve and close to a bus stop and Battunga Park Playground with Strathfieldsaye schools, shops and recreation facilities easily accessed by bitumen walking tracks.
It's perfect for the first home buyer looking to enjoy the freedom of owning your own home. Or for investors, the home is currently leased to fantastic tenants who treat the property as their own and would welcome a new landlord (current rent $410 per week).
** COVID 19 **
This property is available to inspect by appointment only. To arrange your private viewing please contact the agent or our office on 03 5444 2526.
While attending an inspection, we request that all attendees show their ID and provide contact details before entering the property.

Description:
UNIQUE FAMILY HOME IN CENTRAL FLORA HILL
A unique treasure in a highly sought after suburb of Bendigo, this special family home has a lot to offer.
Warm and inviting, the provincial-style kitchen features oodles of bench space with a timber-top breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances including Smeg oven and gas hotplates. The kitchen overlooks the open living and dining area drenched in natural light from plantation shutters throughout and a large Velux skylight with electric blinds.
The second living area features a built-in console cabinet and is wired with surround sound. Three great-sized bedrooms with built-in robes, the large master suite with ensuite. With it's own external entrance, the property also boasts a multi-purpose home office or third living area with front access ideal for those working or running a business from home.
Outside boasts a huge 7.9m x 4m merbau deck ideal for entertaining, a 7m x 3m workshop and water tank.
Other features include a large laundry/utility room offering plenty of storage, dual driveways, polished timber floorboards throughout, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and blockout blinds.
Located in popular Flora Hill, this beautiful home is a rare gem boasting an abundance of living space with the convenience of proximity to schools, shops, public transport, sporting venues, the university and CBD. This property is a must to inspect.

Description:
A "ONE-OFF" IN ARMITAGE ESTATE
A superb flat 701m2 allotment in ever popular Armitage Estate offering over 18m frontage, protective covenants and best of all a fantastic location, handy to Bendigo's Balgownie Estate, a short walk to all Maiden Gully conveniences, primary school and a safe bike ride to Marist College.
There's fencing on one side, the estate is beaming with new and interesting homes and this is possibly your last chance to find a vacant lot to build on in Armitage Estate..

Description:
Renovated Home in Fantastic Location!
Positioned just a short stroll from the Bendigo Hospital, Lake Weeroona and just over two kilometres from Bendigo's Central Business District, 28 Stewart Street is a three-bedroom, two-bathroom weatherboard home with amazing updates including:
Three great sized bedrooms, main with walk in robe and ensuite with built in robes in the remaining two bedrooms
Updated kitchen with stone benchtops, 900mm gas oven and five burner cooktop with breakfast bar
Open plan kitchen, living and dining area with magnificent floorboards
Picture perfect outdoor entertaining decking with rustic timber feature beams
Study nook and adjacent cupboards ideal for working from home
Space for two cars in the large 5.5m X 5.6m (approx.) garage
This low maintenance inner city home is sure to impress on inspection, do not delay in booking your private inspection with a member of the Heard & Co. Sales Team today.
Insights: 28 Stewart Street, North Bendigo VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in North Bendigo have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Strathdale Position
Beautifully renovated throughout this 3-bedroom residence with 2 generous living areas provides an abundance of natural light and includes a stylish new kitchen that overlooks the super-sized allotment of approx 960m2.
2 new contemporary styled bathrooms including a magnificent walk in robe and ensuite to the spacious main bedroom complimented with ducted heating and cooling throughout.
A spacious undercover alfresco area
Ideally suited to a fastidious buyer that appreciates a quality neighbourhood and 3 km from the CBD.
Within a short walk to parks and public transport and numerous other amenities.
All the benefits of an extensively renovated home.
Insights: 15 Cliff Avenue, Strathdale VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 41 other 3 bedroom house in Strathdale have recently been sold.
